pageHeader.subtitle: >- Development of an online interactive catalog for handbags and other fashion accessories designed by The Sak.
pageHeader.description: >- While contracting as a photographer for The Sak, I produced catalog content, including product photography and lifestyle photography, working with models on location. Additionally, I developed and engineered a dynamic website catalog with 3D page turning interactions for this client.

projectInfo.results: Presented at the Design designer(s) exhibition, part of the 'Lille World Design Capital 2020'.
